API

A list of all of the functions included in the geostates package.

Plotting

plot.plot_states(df[, column, ...])

Plot a choropleth map of the United States.

states.get_state(state)

Extract an individual state from the DataFrame.

Shapefiles

load_states()

Loads the shapefile for states in the United States.

load_counties()

Loads the shapefile for counties in the United States.
